Reviews.Title: “WTF”
Reviews.Author: Harold J
Reviews.Content: stayed gf night visiting la checked manager ready 15 minutes strange girlfriend rest manager key entered condom laying garbage totally destroyed odd drugged fantasy start night left 1 hour time clean sheets changed hear people door conversation romance noises shoes rest feet surprise feet sticking ground puzzled paid 72 stay law rape scene tried hard sleep tv porn hardcore porn looked woman suffering dont legal shown woke morning sheets match mattress actually laying mattress white crusty shower water hot cold luke warm straight hot towel provided black smudges window cracked broken easy access manager nice motel portal hell recommend stay except junkies homeless prostitutes

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, quiet, funky--and everything worked.”
Reviews.Author: JackClark
Reviews.Content: little motel decorated eclectic funk looks bit doubtful outside impress door stayed five nights found clean comfortable quiet shower plenty hot water including wifi tv refrigerator microwave iron drawers locks service management friendly helpful judging parking lot containing black mercedes sedan expensive suvs quiet people probably afford looking stayed fiveyearold car lot dont mind funky mishmash decor motel nice location youll probably look elsewhere motel located south santa monica finest la territory oneminute drive i405

Reviews.Title: “Ok nothing special”
Reviews.Author: AndyAA
Reviews.Content: stay lax venice beach probably wasnt choice location wise isnt host nice pick australian accent pretty dark floors average bathroom window flimsy overall ok stay recommend looking elsewhere
